conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D view with wall height/thickness and an angled perspective; however it does not represent the provided 2D plan's full house layout.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (e.g., kitchen/dining/living/study/garage and multiple bedrooms/baths are not represented as a coherent full layout).
Overall wall layout and room adjacency in the 3D render do not align with the 2D plan; the 3D appears to be a different, much smaller floor plan.

summary: Although the second image is a genuine 3D cutaway, it fails as a conversion because it does not match the provided 2D floor plan and omits most rooms.
